DataElement.preferredName: Committee Or Monitoring Regulation Management Authority Professional Organization or Group Type Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the kind of oversight committee. EXAMPLE(S): Adjudication Committee, IRB, Data Safety Monitoring Board

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Committee Or Monitoring Regulation Management Authority Professional Organization or Group Type Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A group delegated to consider some matter; a self-constituted organization to promote something.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A rule or order issued by an authority stating what may or may not be done or how something must be done.:The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.:A person or group with the power or right to give orders or make decisions for a particular area of activity.:A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.
